title: padumanAbhA
sahitya:
padumanAbhA parama puruSA paramjyOti svarUpA 
vidura vandyA vimala candrA vihangAdi rOhiNAya


caraNam 1    utatini vAsa uraga shayana unnatOnnata mahimA 
yadukulOttama yagnya rakSaka yAgnya shikSaka rAma nAma
    caraNam 2    vibhISaNa pAlakA namO namO ibheLa varadAyaka namO namO
    caraNam 3    shubhaprada sumanOra dAya surEndra manOranjanA 
abhiyinAn purandara viTTala pAlare rAma nAma
